SummaryEnglish: Kosuke Kindaichi, one of the most famous detectives in Japan`s detective stories, has a grandson by the name of Hajime. In real life, he is just an ordinary high school student but, when a crime takes place, he uses his inherited talents to solve each case brilliantly.
Aliases: The Case File of Young Kindaichi Returns
金田一少年の事件簿Ｒ（リターンズ）

1.TitleEnglish: Movie 1: The File of Young Kindaichi
1.SummaryEnglish: Invited for a anniversary celebration, Kindaichi, Miyuki and inspector Kenmochi re-visit the Opera House. There they discover that a play of The Phantom of the Opera is being rehearsed again. However, it doesn't take long when members of the acting troupe are killed by the Phantom. Kindaichi will once again have to solve a murder series in the Opera House.

4.SummaryEnglish: Invited for a anniversary celebration, Kindaichi, Miyuki and inspector Kenmochi re-visit the Opera House. There they discover that a play of The Phantom of the Opera is being rehearsed again. However, it doesn't take long when members of the acting troupe are killed by the Phantom. Kindaichi will once again have to solve a murder series in the Opera House.

5.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi and the gang are on their way to a hot spring, but get lost and end up at a run down and sinister hotel. They are told that a vampire used to live in the hotel way back. Someone even died (was found with bite marks on the neck). Six years ago a girl was found in the cellar with bite marks on her neck, and the villagers killed her. When one of the guests is killed and Miyuki is attacked by a creature with fangs, it would seem like the vampire is still there...

8.SummaryEnglish: Miyuki and Kindaichi hear the story about how Inspector Akechi was a really cool mentor to a young policeman named Kobayashi.

22.TitleEnglish: Reversing the Impossible! Miyuki Nanase's Suspicious of Murder

1.TitleEnglish: The Hong Kong Kowloon Treasure Murder Case - File 1
1.SummaryEnglish: When a model who looks like Miyuki goes missing, Miyuki is recruited to take her place at a fashion show event in Hong Kong. Hajime and Miyuki go to Hong Kong, where they run into their friend, Saki... and Miyuki is abducted!

2.TitleEnglish: The Hong Kong Kowloon Treasure Murder Case - File 2
2.SummaryEnglish: While surprising information about the parentage of several of the people involved is revealed, Ran is kidnapped for real and the true nature of the Poison Dragon comes to light. Ran's tattoo indicates the whereabouts of a nuclear bomb that could detonate in less than 12 hours!

3.TitleEnglish: The Hong Kong Kowloon Treasure Murder Case - File 3
3.SummaryEnglish: While Detective Li races to find the bomb before it goes off, Kindaichi goes back to the hotel to recreate the first murder. But how can one killer account for three murders when all of the main suspects have perfect alibis?

4.TitleEnglish: The Hong Kong Kowloon Treasure Murder Case - File 4
4.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi unmasks the true Poison Dragon! Did Miyuki really murder three people in Hong Kong?

5.TitleEnglish: Hayami Reika and the Uninvited Guest
5.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi is on a party boat with idol Hayami Reika and a lot of her other fans. He would be having a great time, too, if it weren't for the suspicious man next to him...

6.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi is on a treasure-hunting reality show with the goal to find a hidden ton of gold bullion, but he and the other contestants and staff don't realize they're being stalked by a murderous masked figure who may be an alchemist! Making matters worse is the fact that they're trapped on an isolated island with no means of communication!

7.SummaryEnglish: The bodies start piling up in the mansion on a solitary island. And when one member is murdered inside of a locked room, the only possible suspect is Reika-chan?!

8.SummaryEnglish: The Alchemist has already committed four murders, but Kindaichi is determined that there be no more. He also wants to prove Reika-chan's innocence, since her fellow entertainers have seen fit to tie her up in the meantime. Can Kindaichi solve the twin mysteries of the locked room murder and the vanished sword?

9.SummaryEnglish: Hajime uncovers the Alchemist's final trick, and then exposes the killer's identity! But what is the person's motive for brutally murdering four people in a mansion on a remote island? The answer lies within a tale of tragedy and revenge!

10.TitleEnglish: The Prison Prep School Murder Case - File 1
10.SummaryEnglish: When Hajime is in danger of having to repeat a year, Miyuki takes him to the hellishly strict Gokumon Prep School. But even before they can get a tour, a former student is murdered there via poison. Kindaichi is on the case, but it looks to become much bigger with a study retreat taking place in a secluded area and the machinations of the Puppeteer from Hell!

11.TitleEnglish: The Prison Prep School Murder Case - File 2
11.SummaryEnglish: The Gokumon Prep School study retreat begins and the conditions are even harsher than Kindaichi was expecting! Not only that, he and Miyuki are put in a separate group, although they both hear hints of a group of six students who did something unforgivable in the past and now fear deadly retribution. Whose strings are the Puppeteer from Hell pulling and what is he going to make them do?!

12.TitleEnglish: The Prison Prep School Murder Case - File 3
12.SummaryEnglish: Chaos ensues when the bodies of four missing students are discovered murdered and positioned in grisly ways patterned after class topics. Kindaichi and Inspector Akechi collaborate by phone from their separate murder sites, but are stumped when everyone has an alibi. Will the Puppeteer from Hell have the last laugh?

13.TitleEnglish: The Prison Prep School Murder Case - File 4
13.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi discovers the secret that punctures everyone's supposedly airtight alibi! He assembles both groups, explains the reasoning behind the theme murders, and calls out the identity of Sparrow, the serial murderer of six students! Except as it turns out, Sparrow is actually...

14.TitleEnglish: The Prison Prep School Murder Case - File 5
14.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi reveals the identity of the second murdering Sparrow! But how did the Puppeteer from Hell convince two law-abiding people to commit serial murder? And what fate lies in store for all three criminals?

15.SummaryEnglish: Hajime, Miyuki, Inspector Kenmochi, and Superintendent Akechi are on JAM flight 377, despite the terrorist threat received right before takeoff. They're getting closer to home when smoke suddenly fills the plane from the rear and the passengers panic, thinking it's terrorism. But things aren't what they appear as Hajime and Akechi soon find themselves trying to solve a locked-room murder case 10,000 meters in the air!

16.SummaryEnglish: Hajime and Akechi team up to expose Captain Shida's killer... or is that killers?! Whatever the case, it leads to a situation where the plane itself (including the hundreds of passengers inside) is put in a perilous position and only one person has a shot of saving them all... but it's not Hajime!

17.SummaryEnglish: One of Kindaichi's earliest cases is a delicate situation as the 14-year-old Hajime is on the trail of Miyuki's missing panties (and watch) from a campground. Complicating matters is the fact that Hajime himself is one of only three suspects, all of whom seem to have an ironclad alibi.

18.SummaryEnglish: In the summer of their third year in middle school, Miyuki drags Hajime to swimming school so he can finally learn, but they stumble upon drama between two divers and former best friends competing for a place at a prestigious high school. An accident happens, putting the wealthy, privileged diver into a coma. Was it down to the rumored "evil spirit of the diving pool"? Hajime suspects a more down-to-earth evil and investigates!

19.SummaryEnglish: Three years ago, a girl died after being kidnapped and abused. The three minors who were responsible are back on the street, but when one of them is shot, Inspector Kenmochi disappears. Has old man Kenmochi turned vigilante?!

20.SummaryEnglish: More evidence backs the unpopular idea that the missing Inspector Kenmochi is targeting the former minors out of revenge for what they did to the teenaged Marina three years ago. Although Hajime is convinced his old friend would never resort to vigilantism, Superintendent Akechi puts out an APB on Kenmochi on suspicion of murder!

21.SummaryEnglish: The Executioner strikes again, this time kidnapping Busujima! Can Hajime and Akechi track them down before it's too late? Plus, more evidence points to Inspector Kenmochi being the murderous vigilante!

22.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi reveals the identity of the real Executioner at last! But what prompted his acts of bloody vengeance? Plus, a guest appearance by Hajime's nemesis!

23.TitleEnglish: The Game Mansion Murder Case, File 1
23.SummaryEnglish: On the bus ride home from an amusement park, Hajime and Miyuki are knocked out with a sleeping gas. They wake up to find themselves trapped in an abandoned hospital with the other bus passengers. Their only chance of getting out alive is by solving the mysterious Game Master's puzzles!

24.TitleEnglish: The Game Mansion Murder Case, File 2
24.SummaryEnglish: The Game Master's deadly game continues, pitting Hajime and company against one lethal trap after another. In fact, it seems like the murderous mastermind wants to do away with all of the members. Will Hajime make it out of the Game Mansion alive, let alone unmask the Game Master?

25.TitleEnglish: The Game Mansion Murder Case, File 3
25.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi unmasks the Game Master, reveals their murderous motive, and shows how their tricks were done. But will the game of death claim one more victim?

1.TitleEnglish: The Death March of Young Kindaichi File 1
1.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi goes to Hong Kong in search of Hell's Puppeteer. He attends a magic show by "Maskman," a name that the Puppeteer has used in the past. But Maskman hypnotizes him, and he starts to feel faint. When he wakes up, he's walking down the hallway of an empty building, and there's a dead body in the room behind him...

2.TitleEnglish: The Death March of Young Kindaichi File 2
2.SummaryEnglish: After everyone sees Kindaichi stab Detective Akechi, he's confined to his room, even if he might have done it in a hypnotic trance. However, Kindaichi's not going to let that stop him from getting to the bottom of this case!

3.TitleEnglish: The Death March of Young Kindaichi File 3
3.SummaryEnglish: The Count of Monte Cristo claims another victim, but Kindaichi has this mystery solved. Will he be able to reveal the answer before he's arrested for murder?

4.TitleEnglish: The Death March of Young Kindaichi File 4
4.SummaryEnglish: Having solved the mysteries, Kindaichi reveals how he was framed for murder, and who the Count of Monte Cristo really is!

5.SummaryEnglish: While at a Go tournament, one of the players gets killed. Who could have done this, and why?

6.SummaryEnglish: Someone set up an elaborate Go-based murder scene in just 5 minutes, but everyone has an alibi? Kindaichi finds the clues to break one alibi and nab the killer!

7.TitleEnglish: Rosy Cross Mansion Murder Case File 1
7.SummaryEnglish: Hell's Puppeteer has a sister, and he wants Hajime's help to protect her. Will they be able to work together to save her from the master of Rosenkreuz Mansion?

8.TitleEnglish: Rosy Cross Mansion Murder Case File 2
8.SummaryEnglish: The plot thickens as the guests find themselves trapped in Rosenkreuz mansion, with more victims soon to fall. Who is the killer behind it all?

9.TitleEnglish: Rosy Cross Mansion Murder Case File 3
9.SummaryEnglish: The guests still trapped in the mansion each receive a letter from Rosenkreuz, ordering them to be at a specific location at a specific time. What is the enigmatic mastermind setting them up for?

10.TitleEnglish: Rosy Cross Mansion Murder Case File 4
10.SummaryEnglish: An offhand comment gives Kindaichi the key to everything that's been going on at Rosenkreuz Mansion!

11.TitleEnglish: Rosy Cross Mansion Murder Case File 5
11.SummaryEnglish: At last, the trick behind the Rosenkreuz Mansion murders is revealed!

12.SummaryEnglish: A young detective, shot with her own gun. Three suspects, each with an airtight alibi. Can Kindaichi solve this seemingly impossible murder?

13.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Snow Demon Murders File 1
13.SummaryEnglish: Kindaichi and Miyuki get the opportunity to go to a ski resort free of charge! But then, trapped on a snowy mountain with no chance of escape, people start disappearing...

14.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Snow Demon Murders File 2
14.SummaryEnglish: It seems death doesn't take a holiday, as the mysterious disappearance at the Snow Goblin Ski Resort is followed by a gruesome murder.

15.TitleEnglish: Snow Goblin Legend Murder Case File 3
15.SummaryEnglish: Miyuki finds more important clues on Sabaki's computer... and Kindaichi figures out who the Snow Demon is!

16.TitleEnglish: Snow Goblin Legend Murder Case File 4

18.TitleEnglish: The Mystery of the Disappeared Gold Medal
